columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the endpoint configuration.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the endpoint configuration.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: A timestamp that shows when the endpoint configuration was created.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: AWS KMS key ID Amazon SageMaker uses to encrypt data when storing it on the ML storage volume attached to the instance.

columns.name: data_capture_config
columns.description: Specifies the parameters to capture input/output of Sagemaker models endpoints.

columns.name: production_variants
columns.description: An array of ProductionVariant objects, one for each model that you want to host at this endpoint.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: The list of tags for the endpoint configuration.
